document_data.name: Wintersun
document_data.mainbody: '''Wintersun''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail}}
document_data.Base: Their holdings were mostly in Cormyr's back country and they were considered backwater hicks by most other noble families. After the [[abraxus affair]] in [[1369 DR]], the family began buying properties in [[Suzail]] in an effort to seem more cosmopolitan and by the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] it was the largest landlord in the city.
document_data.Relationships: The Wintersuns were allied with [[Dracohorn|House Dracohorn]] and [[Illance|House Illance]].
